predicate.note: Frames file for 'privatize' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. No Verbnet entry, no Framenet entry. No comparison.

example.name: typical usage
example.text: ...nor can the government easily back down on promised protection for a privatized company while it proceeds with controversial plans *trace* to privatize most of Britain's water and electricity industries.
example.arg: most of Britain's water and electricity industries
